title: MoS Khar stresses enhanced Pak-UAE trade cooperation
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 26 (APP): State Minister for Foreign Affairs Hina Rabbani Khar on Tuesday stressed exploring close relations with the United Arab Emirates (UAE) in the field of trade and investment.
She expressed these views in a meeting with Ambassador of the United Arab Emirates Hamad Obaid Ibrahim Al-Zaabi here at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
The State Minister reaffirmed Pakistanâ€™s close ties with the UAE in diverse fields.
